headline: LAUDA-BRINKMANN RECIRCULATING CHILLER 1,295 WATTS
categories.lvl2: Heating & Cooling  >  Baths and Chillers > Recirculating Chillers
specstable:
Manufacturer Lauda-Brinkmann
Model WK500
Cooling System
External Cooling Air Cooled
Cooling Capacity 1,295 W (4,417 BTU/hr)
Minimum Temperature 0 ºC (32 ºF, 273.00 ºK)
Maximum Temperature 40 ºC (104 ºF, 313 ºK)
Temperature Control
Control Stability ± 0.500 ºC
Heat/Cool Controls
Control Type Digital Setpoint
Max Flow 8 GPM (30.40 l/m)
Maximum Pressure 14.500 PSI (999.82 mbar, 99,981.85 Pa)
Capacity/Liquid 12.00 L (3.17 gal)
Other Information

Refrigerant: R-134a - 670-Grams.
Built in pressure reducer
Automatic over-pressure shutoff
Motor/compressor overload protection

Power Requirements 115 V 8.2 A 60 Hz 1 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 13.800 in (35.1 cm)
Depth 18.900 in (48.0 cm)
Height 23.600 in (59.9 cm)
Weight 96 lb (44 kg)
